p: Composites of NaAlH 4 and MgH 2 in several proportions (4:1, 2:1, and 1:1) have been studied in the past years [ 152, 153]. In some cases, catalysts, such as TiF 3 [ 154], TiO 2 [ 155], or TiH 2 [ 156], have been used. The composites in general present four dehydrogenation reactions [ 152, 154]: NaAlH 4 + MgH 2 → NaMgH 3 +Al + 1.5H 2 (170–212 °C) (28)
